name: Washington's Wall
description:
President Washington is building a border wall to keep out slobbery Canadian dogs. But he's forgot his stars and stripes wig! Join his faithful canine Dogsworth as he avoids deadly enemies and navigates his way to the top of the wall to return the missing wig. Packed with dozens of playable characters, zany enemies and obstacles, leaderboards, achievements, and more!

Washington's Wall is follow-up to Washington's Wig and was initially released in 2017 on Android and iOS.

GAMEPLAY
Press space to jump or double-jump. Climb as high as you can. Collect powerups and unlock playable characters.

CONTROLS
space/tap/click: START and JUMP and DOUBLE JUMP
